Massachusetts health insurers' reluctance to join a US test to improve health care for disabled low-income adults has led to cuts.

Police: $53 million in jewels stolen in Cannes

A staggering 40 million euro worth of diamonds and other jewels was stolen Sunday from a hotel in Cannes, in one of Europe’s biggest jewelry heists in recent years, police said.
